name: PowerZ
storyline: The Village of Aria. The main zone of the game. Aria is where the player will meet most of the main NPCs, his chimera, and discover the main gameplay mechanics : encyclopedia, chimera evolution and his own island where he can build whatever he likes. Aria can welcome up to 7 players within the same village, where players can compare their level in the mini games and play catch games. Each player has its own island that other villagers can visit.
summary:
PowerZ offers a learning experience that blends the magic of video games and the structure of teaching so that all children, 6 and up, can discover their passions and “superpowerz.”

Each child learns what they enjoy and at their own pace. Raising a star-struck astronomy lover? A budding botanist? Or maybe a meticulous mathlete? PowerZ has something for everyone.
